text: I ordered a pair of Maui Jim sunglasses. I had already tried the glasses on at a department store so I knew the style and fit was to my liking. What really impressed me about SmartBuyGlasses was how responsive their customer service was. I used PayPal to purchase the glasses but PayPal used the wrong shipping address. I used the customer service chat feature and they were able to correct the shipping address in a matter of minutes. The glasses arrived in a few days. The glasses were also about $60 cheaper than what I could find in the department stores! Thank you SmartBuyGlasses!
